item.title: Posterior Beta Distribition evolution
item.description: rm(list=ls()) set.seed(1010101) theta <- 0.5 N <- 200 data <- rbinom(N,1,theta) a <- 1 b <- 1 for (i in 1:N){ # suppose patients are treated one-by-one if (i < 10 || i %% 10 == 1 ) { theta.x <- seq(0.01, .99, 0.01) p.y <- dbeta(theta.x,a,b) plot(theta.x,p.y,main = paste("N=",i,"a=",a,"b=",b),type="l") } if (data[i]==1){ # if the i-th is cured by the treatment # basically add 1 to a for X===1 a <- a + 1 } else { # if the i-th is NOT cured by the treatment # basically add 1 to b for X===0 b <- b + 1 } # probability of theta>1/2 based on the posterior distribution Ptheta <- 1 - pbeta(0.
